_header: I believe in God the Father almighty
_description: The Creed — two stanzas rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
I beleue in god the ffader all myghtyMaker of heuene & all
                    erthely thyng…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…In Communyng of Seyntes & forgen euysseThe flesh
                    agaynrysyng & euer lastyng blysse
